parameter.name: BlackPt
Black point
parameter.comment: Output color to which darkest input color is mapped (default black)

parameter.name: WhitePt
White point
parameter.comment: Output color to which brightest input color is mapped (default white)

parameter.name: Smoothing
Smoothing
parameter.comment: Amount of temporal smoothing of the input range, to reduce flicker (default 0)

parameter.name: Independence
Independence
parameter.comment: Proportion of independent to linked channel normalization (default 1000)

parameter.name: Strength
Strength
parameter.comment: Strength of filter, from no effect (0) to full normalization (default 1000)
